description: Tools for managing incidents and service disruptions

tools.name: get_recent_incidents
tools.description: Retrieves incidents from a specified time period with filtering options for status and severity

hours_back.description: Number of hours back to retrieve incidents from

status.description: Filter by incident status (open, investigating, resolved, closed)

severity.description: Filter by severity level (critical, high, medium, low)

service.description: Filter by specific service or system name

tools.name: get_incident_details
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific incident including timeline, resolution steps, and impact

include_timeline.description: Whether to include detailed timeline of incident updates

tools.name: get_incident_metrics
tools.description: Retrieves aggregated metrics and statistics about incidents for a specified time period

group_by.description: Group metrics by category (status, severity, service, team)
